Reviews: A number of Viet cafes recently opened in SJ to end 2022 strong!  For this location, the coffee was okay, and so were other drinks from what I can tell. Cafe has the typical interior layout; mostly tables for four but no sofas. The uniqueness is a non-Viet staff except for the owner? The atmosphere is great. Everyone is friendly and actually talks to you instead of hanging out behind the counter, lol. Many TVs are showing sports if you're not into chatting.  Easyvto find and plenty of parking. It is located in a small outdoor shopping center on the main thoroughfare Tully Rd. Add to the Viet cafes rotation, yeah.
Relevant Content: *The atmosphere is great. *Everyone is friendly and actually talks to you instead of hanging out behind the counter, lol. *Many TVs are showing sports if you're not into chatting.
Replies: * Great atmosphere * Friendly staff engage in conversation * Many TVs showing sports for entertainment

Reviews: The women were nice and friendly. A little bit on the older side. Plenty of TVs to watch the game. Just your standard cà phê sữa đá joint.
Relevant Content: *Plenty of TVs to watch the game. *Just your standard cà phê sữa đá joint.
Replies: * Numerous TVs available for sports viewing * Serves typical cà phê sữa đá beverages

Summary: Based on the provided bullet points, the ambiance at DV Cafe seems to be positive. Customers have mentioned the great atmosphere and friendly staff who engage in conversation. The presence of many TVs showing sports for entertainment is also a plus. Additionally, the cafe serves typical cà phê sữa đá beverages. Overall, it seems like a good place to hang out and catch up with friends while enjoying some drinks and sports on TV.
